MediaQueryListMatches.summary:
The matches read-only property of the
interface is a boolean value that returns
true if the currently matches the media query list,
or false if not.

remarks.para:
You can be notified when the value of matches changes by watching for the
event to be fired at the
MediaQueryList.

MediaQueryListMatches.value:
A boolean value that is true if the
currently matches the media query list; otherwise, it's false.
